translations.translation: Logs Data Platform allows you to create and host Elasticsearch indexes. These can be used for configuration data of a Kibana instance, index statistical data and enrich or correlate your logs. You can then use these indexes with most of the tools and applications that are compatible with the Elasticsearch REST API.
The network {{network}} has been added successfully to input {{inputTitle}}
The network {{network}} has been removed successfully from input {{inputTitle}}
An error has occurred while trying to add network {{network}} to input {{inputTitle}}: {{message}}
An error has occurred while trying to remove network {{network}} from input {{inputTitle}}: {{message}}
